mapper.select: SELECT USER_NAME as userName, USER_SOCIAL_SECUNUM as userSocialSecunum, USER_SEX as userGender, USER_COMP as userComp, USER_COMP_ENTERDATE as userCompEnterdate, USER_DEPT as userDept, USER_SPOT as userSpot, USER_ARMY_SERV as userArmyServ, USER_MARITAL_STATUS as userMaritalStatus, USER_ARMY_SERV_ENTER as userArmyServEnter, USER_ARMY_SERV_LEAVE as userArmyServLeave, USER_ARMY_SERV_PERIOD as userArmyServPeriod, USER_TELNUM_WIRED as userTelnumWired, USER_TELNUM_WIRELESS as userTelnumWireless, USER_EMAIL as userEmail, USER_ZIPCODE as userZipcode, USER_ADDRESS as userAddress FROM USER_INFO WHERE USER_IDX = #{userIdx }

SELECT CAREER_IDX as careerIdx, USER_IDX as userIdx, CAREER_COMP_NAME as careerCompName, to_char(CAREER_ENTERDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') as careerEnterdate, to_char(CAREER_LEAVEDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') as careerLeavedate, CAREER_SPOT as careerSpot, CAREER_RESPONSIB as careerResponsib FROM USER_INFO_CAREER WHERE USER_IDX = #{userIdx }
SELECT EDU_IDX as eduIdx, USER_IDX as userIdx, EDU_SCHOOL_NAME as eduSchoolName, EDU_STATUS as eduStatus, to_char(EDU_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') as eduDate FROM USER_INFO_EDU WHERE USER_IDX = #{userIdx }
SELECT QUALIFI_IDX as qualifiIdx, USER_IDX as userIdx, QUALIFI_NAME as qualifiName, to_char(QUALIFI_GETDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') as qualifiGetdate FROM USER_INFO_QUALIFI WHERE USER_IDX = #{userIdx}

SELECT TRAINING_IDX as trainingIdx, USER_IDX as userIdx, TRAINING_NAME as trainingName, to_char(TRAINING_STARTDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') as trainingStartdate, to_char(TRAINING_ENDDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') as trainingEnddate, TRAINING_AGENCY as trainingAgency FROM USER_INFO_TRAINING WHERE USER_IDX = #{userIdx}
SELECT LICEN_IDX as licenIdx, USER_IDX as userIdx, LICEN_NAME as licenName, LICEN_SKILL_LEVEL as licenSkillLevel FROM USER_INFO_LICEN WHERE USER_IDX = #{userIdx}

SELECT SKILL_IDX as skillIdx, USER_IDX as userIdx, SKILL_PROJECT_NAME as skillProjectName, SKILL_STARTDATE as skillStartdate, SKILL_ENDDATE as skillEnddate, SKILL_CUSTOMER_COMP as skillCustomerComp, SKILL_WORK_COMP as skillWorkComp, SKILL_APPLIED as skillApplied, SKILL_INDUSTRY as skillIndustry, SKILL_ROLE as skillRole, SKILL_MODEL as skillModel, SKILL_OS as skillOs, SKILL_LANG as skillLang, SKILL_DBMS as skillDbms, SKILL_COMM as skillComm, SKILL_TOOL as skillTool, SKILL_ETC as skillEtc FROM USER_INFO_SKILL WHERE USER_IDX = #{userIdx}
SELECT USER_IDX as userIdx FROM USER_INFO WHERE USER_SOCIAL_SECUNUM = #{userSocialSecunum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_INFO VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(USER_IDX),0)+1 FROM USER_INFO), SYSDATE, #{userName}, #{userSocialSecunum}, #{userGender}, #{userComp}, #{userCompEnterdate}, #{userDept}, #{userSpot}, #{userArmyServ}, #{userMaritalStatus}, #{userArmyServEnter}, #{userArmyServLeave}, #{userArmyServPeriod}, #{userTelnumWired}, #{userTelnumWireless}, #{userEmail}, #{userZipcode}, #{userAddress} )
INSERT INTO USER_INFO_EDU VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(EDU_IDX),0)+1 FROM USER_INFO_EDU), #{userIdx}, #{eduSchoolName}, #{eduStatus}, #{eduDate} )
INSERT INTO USER_INFO_QUALIFI VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(QUALIFI_IDX),0)+1 FROM USER_INFO_QUALIFI), #{userIdx}, #{qualifiName}, #{qualifiGetdate} )

INSERT INTO USER_INFO_CAREER VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(CAREER_IDX),0)+1 FROM USER_INFO_CAREER), #{userIdx}, #{careerCompName}, #{careerEnterdate}, #{careerLeavedate}, #{careerSpot}, #{careerResponsib} )
INSERT INTO USER_INFO_TRAINING VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(TRAINING_IDX),0)+1 FROM USER_INFO_TRAINING), #{userIdx}, #{trainingName}, #{trainingStartdate}, #{trainingEnddate}, #{trainingAgency} )
INSERT INTO USER_INFO_LICEN VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(LICEN_IDX),0)+1 FROM USER_INFO_LICEN), #{userIdx}, #{licenName}, #{licenSkillLevel} )

INSERT INTO USER_INFO_SKILL VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(SKILL_IDX),0)+1 FROM USER_INFO_SKILL), #{userIdx}, #{skillProjectName}, #{skillStartdate}, #{skillEnddate}, #{skillCustomerComp}, #{skillWorkComp}, #{skillApplied}, #{skillIndustry}, #{skillRole}, #{skillModel}, #{skillOs}, #{skillLang}, #{skillDbms}, #{skillComm}, #{skillTool}, #{skillEtc} )
mapper.update: UPDATE USER_INFO SET USER_NAME = #{userName}, USER_SOCIAL_SECUNUM = #{userSocialSecunum}, USER_SEX = #{userGender}, USER_COMP = #{userComp}, USER_COMP_ENTERDATE = #{userCompEnterdate}, USER_DEPT = #{userDept}, USER_SPOT = #{userSpot}, USER_ARMY_SERV = #{userArmyServ}, USER_MARITAL_STATUS = #{userMaritalStatus}, USER_ARMY_SERV_ENTER = #{userArmyServEnter}, USER_ARMY_SERV_LEAVE = #{userArmyServLeave}, USER_ARMY_SERV_PERIOD = #{userArmyServPeriod}, USER_TELNUM_WIRED = #{userTelnumWired}, USER_TELNUM_WIRELESS = #{userTelnumWireless}, USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail}, USER_ZIPCODE = #{userZipcode}, USER_ADDRESS = #{userAddress} WHERE USER_IDX = #{userIdx}
UPDATE USER_INFO_EDU SET EDU_SCHOOL_NAME = #{eduSchoolName}, EDU_STATUS = #{eduStatus}, EDU_DATE = #{eduDate} WHERE USER_IDX = #{userIdx}

UPDATE USER_INFO_CAREER SET CAREER_COMP_NAME = #{careerCompName}, CAREER_ENTERDATE = #{careerEnterdate}, CAREER_LEAVEDATE = #{careerLeavedate}, CAREER_SPOT = #{careerSpot}, CAREER_RESPONSIB = #{careerResponsib} WHERE USER_IDX = #{userIdx}

UPDATE USER_INFO_TRAINING SET TRAINING_NAME = #{trainingName}, TRAINING_STARTDATE = #{trainingStartdate}, TRAINING_ENDDATE = #{trainingEnddate}, TRAINING_AGENCY = #{trainingAgency} WHERE USER_IDX = #{userIdx}

UPDATE USER_INFO_SKILL SET SKILL_PROJECT_NAME = #{skillProjectName}, SKILL_STARTDATE = #{skillStartdate}, SKILL_ENDDATE = #{skillEnddate}, SKILL_CUSTOMER_COMP = #{skillCustomerComp}, SKILL_WORK_COMP = #{skillWorkComp}, SKILL_APPLIED = #{skillApplied}, SKILL_INDUSTRY = #{skillIndustry}, SKILL_ROLE = #{skillRole}, SKILL_MODEL = #{skillModel}, SKILL_OS = #{skillOs}, SKILL_LANG = #{skillLang}, SKILL_DBMS = #{skillDbms}, SKILL_COMM = #{skillComm}, SKILL_TOOL = #{skillTool}, SKILL_ETC = #{skillEtc} WHERE USER_IDX = #{userIdx}
